players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob's death means the mafia is among us. Diana, why did you remain silent? We need everyone talking to find the killer."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and she's guilty."
Diana: "I'm not the mafioso, Bob was a suspect too. Charlie, you're lying."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Diana instead of Bob? Bob was the most suspicious to me. Diana, who do you think is lying?"
Charlie: "I investigated Diana because I had a hunch. Bob's death proves I was right. Diana is lying to save herself."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
